hero.intro: I build resilient backend systems that power thousands of payment transactions. Specialized in NestJS, Node.js, and PostgreSQL — with a knack for turning complex problems into elegant, scalable solutions.

about.label: // about-me
about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Backend engineer with a passion for scalable architecture
about.p1: I'm a Senior Backend Engineer with 6+ years of professional experience and over a decade writing code. For the past 4+ years, I've been building the payment and event management infrastructure at Blackthorn.io, working across the full backend stack — NestJS microservices, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis — designing systems that handle thousands of daily transactions reliably.
about.p2: What sets me apart is my ability to rapidly adapt to new technologies and bring innovative solutions to the table. From migrating 48 Salesforce classes to external storage to implementing purchase funnel analytics with Google Tag Manager — I don't just write code, I solve business problems.
about.p3: Before Blackthorn, I gained versatile experience in Salesforce development, Azure cloud integrations (40+ enterprise integration flows), and full-stack development. I believe the best engineers are the ones who never stop learning — which is why I'm currently diving into LangChain, LangGraph, and AI Agents.
about.learning_items: LangChain · LangGraph · AI Agents · Software Architecture

experience.label: // career-path
experience.title: Experience
experience.subtitle: Building impactful software across payments, cloud, and enterprise systems

roles.title: Senior Backend Engineer
bullets: Migrated 48 Salesforce classes (events, tickets, and system data) to external database storage, bypassing governor limits and improving scalability without compromising security policies
Implemented Redis caching system with dynamic TTLs across all non-payment endpoints, reducing large list query response times from 20+ seconds to sub-second
Designed and built purchase funnel analytics using Google Tag Manager, tracking user drop-off points and event engagement to enable data-driven product decisions
Co-created new microservices from scratch within a 10+ repository NestJS architecture, improving service isolation and independent deployability
Provide cross-functional support: mentoring developers, assisting QA team, and handling Tier 3 production escalations
Participate in on-call rotation, regularly resolving critical payment production incidents under pressure

roles.title: Salesforce Developer
bullets: Provided CPQ support and maintenance for active client production systems on the Salesforce platform
Resolved long-standing bugs in client Salesforce applications, improving system reliability for end users
Monitored and reviewed trigger handlers, batch jobs, and schedulable processes to ensure operational stability

roles.title: Azure Integration Developer
bullets: Built 40+ enterprise integration flows using Azure Logic Apps, Function Apps, Service Bus, Data Factory, and Data Lake
Connected Salesforce with Microsoft Dynamics 365 and other enterprise systems for seamless data exchange
Implemented end-to-end monitoring via Serverless360 with Business Activity Monitoring, providing full visibility into integration health

roles.title: Full Stack Developer
bullets: Built a full-stack graphic resources platform from scratch using Angular 9 frontend and Node.js/Express RESTful API
Translated Adobe XD mockups into production-ready interfaces using Bootstrap and Angular Material
Identified and proposed architectural improvements to key portions of the codebase

skills.label: // tech-stack
skills.title: Skills
skills.subtitle: Technologies I work with daily and have deep experience in

testimonials.label: // what-colleagues-say
testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.subtitle: From people I've had the pleasure of working with

items.text: Joaquín consistently demonstrates exceptional technical skills and a deep understanding of our industry. His innovative approach and problem-solving abilities have significantly contributed to the success of our projects. He is not only technically proficient but also a fantastic team player. He is always willing to lend a hand, share his knowledge, and collaborate to achieve the best results.
items.name: Hugo Héctor Fernández

items.text: I was lucky to call him my coworker. He consistently gave 100 percent effort to the team and played a significant role in ensuring that we completed assignments on time. Any team would be lucky to have Joaquín.
items.name: Cristian Vizzarri

contact.label: // get-in-touch
contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Let's build something great together
contact.intro: I'm always open to discussing new opportunities, interesting projects, or just connecting with fellow developers. Feel free to reach out!

footer.copyright: Joaquín Noguera Velázquez. Built with vanilla HTML, CSS & JS.

cv.title: Joaquín Noguera Velázquez
cv.subtitle: Senior Backend Engineer
cv.summary: Senior Backend Engineer with 6+ years of professional experience and 10+ years programming. For the past 4+ years at Blackthorn.io, I've built scalable payment and event management systems using NestJS microservices, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, and Redis. Proven track record of solving complex challenges — from migrating 48 Salesforce classes to implementing Redis caching that reduced query times from 20s to sub-second. Adaptable engineer who rapidly masters new technologies and delivers innovative solutions. Currently exploring AI agents with LangChain and LangGraph.
